root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Duel Transer
root.description: OverviewYu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Duel Transer is a trading card game developed and published by Konami for the Wii platform.Card ScannerThe originally planned to be released card scannerWhen Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's Duel Transer was announced it was supposed to be released with a physical USB card scanner which players could use to scan physical Yu-Gi-Oh! cards into the game. Konami later announced that the card scanner would not be released due to technical issues.
